website_summaries.verdict: Both a luxury and an investment, Yamaha's PRO 500 headphones deliver rich bass and a wide stereo field, easily earning our Editors' Choice award.
pros: Clean, powerful audio performance, with deep bass and no distortion at top volumes
Provides an excellent sense of depth and space in the stereo field
Detachable cables?one with iOS device controls and microphone, one without
cons: Can be uncomfortable during long listening periods

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Please make sure you do a lot of research on this product before buy it. I bought this and the ear pads were not comfortable after I practice my piano lesson. Sounds was good but with the headset being heavy and with uncomfortable ear pads, I requested a refund within the 30 days time frame. Got bad customer service. Had to pay my own shipping and there is a 20% restocking fee if not broken. Mine was brand new and only got pay 50% back. Please beware when you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dandee

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound quality, poor plastic quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the sound quality of these headphones while they worked. Sadly, the plastic bridge which connects the ear pieces failed leaving me with a less functional product. I was disappointed in the quality of the plastic they had used. To be honest, I always thought it was metal until it broke. These headphones are also not as comfortable as some other models available on the market.
customer_reviews.author: David Atherton

customer_reviews.title: Majestic
customer_reviews.text: Music comes through with clarity and bass comes through with authority. While many reviewers cite the strong bass, it does not muddle up the highs and the bass is only there if the material calls for it. Put on Beethoven Symphony No 9 and play through Dragonfly and I seem to be able to count the number of voices in the recording (including the chorus members). I have a relative large head and I need no adjustment to fit, so I can understand if others may found it too large or bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but not the whole package
customer_reviews.text: Forward, intimate, engaging, balanced, accurate, detailed, and revealing of source material (not so much amping). Doesn't sound great at low listening levels, seems to sound better loud. Fit is poor at best and I will only be using these for critical listening and checking mixes. For long sessions, I would prefer open cans or earbuds/iems if it's more appropriate. I do really like the sound, but the pressure on the ears/temples is a bit much for extended listening, and I think that comfort is really important in a headphone, because I could see it being a deal breaker here for a lot of people :- /
customer_reviews.author: MagicTouch

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Set of Cans
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the price, as I purchased as open box from Amazon Warehouse deals. They fit my head quite well, as long as I use the extra piece of cushion provided between the top of the phones and the top of my head. I have worn these for up to 3 hours with no discomfort at all. Sound reproduction is excellent, and although I am not a true audiophile, I can pick up nuances which I never heard listening to my 7.1 channel Yamaha system through Athena speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Gschne

customer_reviews.title: Im so glad i got it used and didnt have to pay ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a bit more louder and the bass richer, maybe im expecting too much. Other then that it sounds crisp and clean. Im so glad i got it used and didnt have to pay for a new one. Its a great product dont get me wrong, its just that i was looking for a deep bass type of headphones
customer_reviews.author: Harmina

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I hoped for considering the price.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality from my Yamaha keyboard is excellent. However, apart from being blue and not black as stated, there is no adjustment to raise the ear pieces to my particular level although they can be extended, consequently I have to keep pushing them up while playing.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Couzens

customer_reviews.title: Best Sound Quality, but Not the Most Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. I have Bose QC 15 and Beats, but the sound quality award goes to the Yamaha. As others have stated, they are big and feel a bit heavy. I would not use the word comfortable in describing the Yamaha. Bose is by far the most comfortable and I do enjoy the noise cancellation, particularly when traveling. Bottom line, when I'm heading to the airport, the Yamaha headphones are in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Vic P.

customer_reviews.title: I am a big guy and they fit me fine however I use them all the way in
customer_reviews.text: Sound and quality are superb. I am a big guy and they fit me fine however I use them all the way in. Definitely wouldn't fit a smaller person.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I have a small dome, and although the musical quality was better than the Beats Pro series for the same price, I could not keep them because I couldn't get them small enough to just hang past my ear lobe. Sorry Yamaha, its a great product, but not all of us have fat heads
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: We have several headphones but the YAMAHA PRO 500 are the best out there
customer_reviews.text: The YAMAHA PRO-500 are exceptional headphones. We have several headphones but the YAMAHA PRO 500 are the best out there. Extraordinary sound quality and detail. Exceptional balance. Perfect fit. Overall a 10.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELO BENITEZ

customer_reviews.title: just like the reviews
customer_reviews.text: They are relatively heavy. Appear to be designed for big heads. Great sound. Loosen up and become more comfortable with use. bottom line -- if you can live with the cons, these have great sound.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Bass and treble in perfect harmony
customer_reviews.text: Plus -Bass and treble in perfect harmony -Excellent sound -Top quality product -Looks great -Yamaha -Input/output on the left and on the right as well Minus -Not the best fit.Materials are soft and smooth but the headphones are too tight.As a result you cannot listen for a long period without changing their position a little bit,from time to time
customer_reviews.author: Georgios D. Tselios

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I have ever owned, especially if you are looking for clarity. Depending on the device you are using, you may want a headphone amp to go with to truly power these
customer_reviews.author: William S. Pemberton

customer_reviews.title: Great sound when connected to Great Sorce
customer_reviews.text: With these seems sound quality is limited by source quality. Purchased some HD tracks , helped . Will be upgrading sound card next. As others have said little heavy, would be better if could adjust smaller to put more weight on head not ears. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: thesmithbuilt

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and build quality
customer_reviews.text: Just great headphones. Sound great, music is very clear with no artificial sounds and is rendered in great fidelity. Earpieces can be little uncomfortable, but that's just a minor detail.
customer_reviews.author: Z2000

customer_reviews.title: The pro500  are the best in the market period!!!
customer_reviews.text: The pro500 are the best headphones in the market today!!!! Sound is totally awesome! The fit very good and Sorry the beats suck! Yamaha is going solo in the headphone field going all the way to the top!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Radecki

customer_reviews.title: fine phones
customer_reviews.text: high fidelity. Use them for mixing my music. Hear detail, no distortion. fit well. comfortable. long cord. adapter for qtr inch.
customer_reviews.author: srslle

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Better than beats pro and studio, good bass and clarity. Definately worth the money. And the headphones are comphy even though all the reviews say they arent
customer_reviews.author: phillip barrows

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, headband is garbage.
customer_reviews.text: The sound engineers did a great job but the mechanical engineers who designed the headband probably smoked dope every day in their college career. My headband broke right at the pivot point and I can see the material rhey used is about as cheap as you can get. I've never seen a poorer excuse for a high end product in my life. I never write reviews but I'm really pissed about these because I really liked the sound. And I never mishandled them and always kept them in their case.
customer_reviews.author: Piezanno

customer_reviews.title: Great Ear Phones
customer_reviews.text: Mu husband LOVES these earphones. The quality of sound is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: onmytyme

customer_reviews.title: Sweet, Accurate headphones, Great Job Yamaha!
customer_reviews.text: These have exceeded my expectations! Amazing transparency, with tight accurate bass. Everything I had hoped for and MORE! And I am still breaking them in!
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: This headphone doesn't have a hard structure
customer_reviews.text: The sound is beautiful, but it's too tight to wear it. And even it's tight, when I shake it lightly, I can hear some terrible sound from screws.
customer_reviews.author: Qiuyuchen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were a great price, with amazing sound! Prompt service. Im very happy with this purchase and would recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice...comfortable and tones are very nice...if you are looking for headphones these are the one you want
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Hibbs

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphone
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. The headphone is beautiful and sounds amazing. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: SIYU DENG

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Sounds amazing :), bought it used and am glad I saved the money as I cannot tell it's been used in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortablefor long hours of hearing, incredible sound quality and I absolutely would recommend them to anybody. Nice design and really stylish
customer_reviews.author: ezequiel

customer_reviews.title: voice so cool,and too heavy
customer_reviews.text: 1.88KG OMG,It's too too too heavy.Not long time use it. But the voice is so cool,and is a real beauty
customer_reviews.author: pbt1214

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: The best of headphone and light weight great quality comfortable after im burn in 200 hours you will got better sound
customer_reviews.author: freedom

customer_reviews.title: S'ok
customer_reviews.text: Good sound although the bass could be a little heavier. The weight is definitely a little heavy as others have described so they can leave your ears and neck hurting if you wear them for too long. Otherwise not a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisM

customer_reviews.title: outstanding headphones
customer_reviews.text: lite and just what i wanted. they beat out all the others with the possible exception of the Beat. They were a much better buy
customer_reviews.author: Michael F Lanza

customer_reviews.title: good sound ugly colour
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good for the price, but I have to say this is really ugly colour, the blue is not the blue you see in picture. If they can make the colour for pic why can't make it real?
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: DR.WHO
customer_reviews.text: Thank you YAMAHA!!! Just received my pro 500 today from amazon.YAMAHA has created a killer pair of headphones! when i put them on don't even want to take them off the sound is that powerful!! Blows me away how powerful these sound with the iPhone 4s.dont want to even use my other headphones could of saved a lot of money.if these where available earlier.They are worth the money. just get them no disappointment what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Philip W

customer_reviews.title: Buy, at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, superb sound, until they start to tear apart (see customer images). That's exactly what's happening to me. For $199 (offer at the time I got it) I expected something with great quality and no just a cheap plastic, manufacturer defective headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Zenon Monge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've always went for the best and this is indeed just that
customer_reviews.author: Donovan fremeth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound, Not So Amazing Fit for Me
customer_reviews.text: I love the amazing sound this headphone produces. I'd give five stars for that. However, it is very big and heavy for my small head. The cups clamp so had on my upper jaw and creates a pain whenever I put it on. I'd give two stars for that reason. I have decided to return this item back to Amazon. I don't like on-ear or in-ear headphones so I guess my next try will be V-Moda Crossfade M-100.
customer_reviews.author: Toddy

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: it is a heavy piece of equipment making 10 minutes of use you need a break. it is also unconfortable because the earpads goes until your neck, below your ears, impeding the blood circulation. overall the sound quality is good but misses deep bass.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: and love the sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a few months ago, and love the sound. However, the slidiing ear piece broke and there is no way to get it fixed, as I discarded the box. Never did I think headphones that cost this much money could break from just using them at night while resting in bed. Very upsetting. Amazon does not stand behind the products one has had for more than one month. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Gollub

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit
customer_reviews.text: Cups are to small and hurt your ears after being worn for prolonged periods of time. The sound quality itself is great
customer_reviews.author: BrianW

customer_reviews.title: it not cost that money!
customer_reviews.text: It is not so comfortable to use. The effect of music is good. Uncomfortable ear fit and it's too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: yanbing jiang

customer_reviews.title: headphone broke in 3 months
customer_reviews.text: My headphones broke in 3 months. i guess because the headphones are heavy it broke from the headband side. i have dr dre beats studio that i used for 2 years and half. its little beat up but it didn't break like that but still useable. FYI i never took my headphones anywhere they are always on the desk hooked to my laptop but i do use them like 4-8 hours a day. Buyer beware yeah they sound AMAZING and all but build quality is bad i didn't expect that from Yamaha.
customer_reviews.author: Talon

product_meta.title: Yamaha PRO 500 High Fidelity Premium Over Ear Headphones (Piano Black)
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER


YAMAHA PRO 500 HIGH-FIDELITY PREMIUM OVER-EAR HEADPHONES
 
"THE YAMAHA PRO 500 IS A FORMIDABLE BEAST."
"Clean, powerful audio performance, with deep bass and no distortion at top volumes. Provides an excellent sense of depth and space in the stereo field." — Tim Gideon, PCMag.com, January 2013. 


"THE YAMAHA PRO 500'S ARE A BEAUTIFULLY-DESIGNED PAIR OF HEADPHONES."
"They are going to look good and sound great... they are priced right and we think they are going to be very popular for the person who doesn't want overemphasized and bloated bass, but a smoother, more articulate headphone." — Clint DeBoer, Audioholics, January 2013.



IF YOU LOVE MUSIC, LISTEN TO THE PROS




As the world's largest musical instrument manufacturer and the leading choice of professionals for studio and concert gear, Yamaha knows better than anyone how to make your music sound its absolute best. Now you can enjoy the Studio Sound experience anywhere you go. PRO Series headphones go beyond just "powerful bass" to authentically reproduce any style of music. From Classic Rock to Hip-Hop, from Latin Jazz to Delta Blues, the PRO Series brings all your music to life. Your collection is waiting…





WORLD-CLASS AUDIO QUALITY
The flagship of Yamaha's PRO Series line, the PRO 500 headphones enclose robust 50 mm drivers in high-grade, rigid aluminum alloy earcups to deliver the ultimate sonic experience. The drivers incorporate a new Yamaha-proprietary design featuring neodymium magnets that provide maximum efficiency when used with mobile devices such as smartphones, tablets and other portable music players. The over-ear cup shape offers excellent noise isolation, while the ultra-premium ear cushion materials insure a crisp, clear sound.








ULTRA-COMFORTABLE AND BUILT TO LAST
Built to handle the rigors of everyday use without wearing you down, the PRO 500 features an adjustable, reinforced headband with ample padding textured for a pleasant feel. The band is shaped to apply just the right amount of pressure – snug enough to provide noise isolation, yet light enough for long listening sessions. Its ear cushions are extraordinarily soft and smooth, with a feel so natural you’ll never want to take it off.





FUEL-INJECTED DESIGN
Drawing inspiration from the world’s finest musical instruments and motorcycles, the PRO Series headphones get your heart racing before you even plug them in. Gorgeous geometry and ultra-clean design curves are matched with premium color and finish materials, and emblazoned boldly with Yamaha's iconic tuning-fork marque, conjuring the power and energy of our high-performance supersport bikes. The PRO 500 is available in Piano Black and Racing Blue.





VERSATILE, HIGH-PERFORMANCE CONNECTIVITY
The PRO 500 comes with two detachable, tangle-resistant flat cables: one in a 4 ft length with an in-line remote/mic, ideal for most mobile applications, and one in a 10 ft length for use in the home. Both cables are made from a material that is durable and designed to reduce "touch noise" transfer effects. The flat construction keeps the internal cores separated to minimize interference and terminates to a low-profile right-angle connector. The PRO 500 offers dual input/output ports, one on each earcup, providing flexible connectivity. A gold-plated ¼" adapter is included in the box for connecting to professional-grade audio equipment.





CONTROL AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
The 4 ft cable includes an in-line remote/microphone optimized for use with Apple iPod, iPhone and iPad devices. The "+" and "-" buttons control volume for both music and phone calls, while the center button allows you to play/pause music, skip to the next song, skip to the previous song, or answer/end phone calls. The controller buttons provide a tactile click-response, enabling intuitive operation without need for visual reference. For non-Apple devices, control behavior varies due to differences in applications and pin configurations.





TAKE YOUR LISTENING ROOM WITH YOU
Engineered to move you and keep you moving, the PRO 500 folds into a compact size for traveling. It also comes with a semi-rigid protective carrying case. Plug it in anywhere and escape to an auditory utopia.





WHICH YAMAHA PRO SERIES HEADPHONE IS RIGHT FOR YOU?
YAMAHA PRO 300
Check out the Yamaha PRO 300 YAMAHA PRO 400
Check out the Yamaha PRO 400 YAMAHA PRO 500
Check out the Yamaha PRO 500 Design On-ear, closed back Over-ear, closed back Over-ear, closed back, rigid aluminum alloy earcup Driver Type Dynamic, neodymium magnet Dynamic, neodymium magnet Dynamic, neodymium magnet Driver Unit Φ1-5/8” (40 mm) Φ2” (50 mm) Φ2” (50 mm) Impedance 53 ohms @ 1kHz 23 ohms @ 1kHz 23 ohms @ 1kHz Maximum Power 300 mW 1,000 mW 1,000 mW Sound Pressure 107 dB ±3 dB (1 kHz, 1 mW) 106 dB ±3 dB (1 kHz, 1 mW) 106 dB ±3 dB (1 kHz, 1 mW) Frequency Response 20 Hz – 20 kHz 20 Hz – 20 kHz 20 Hz – 20 kHz Weight 7 oz (200 g) with attached cable 10.2 oz (289 g) without cable 13 oz (369 g) without cable Ports -- 1/8” (3.5 mm) on left earcup Dual 1/8” (3.5 mm) input/output, one each on the left and right earcups Cable Length 4 ft (1.2 m) attached, tangle-resistant flat cable with remote/mic optimized for Apple devices CABLE A: 4 ft (1.2 m) detachable, tangle-resistant flat cable with remote/mic optimized for Apple devices; CABLE B: 10 ft (3 m) detachable, tangle-resistant flat cable CABLE A: 4 ft (1.2 m) detachable, tangle-resistant flat cable with remote/mic optimized for Apple devices; CABLE B: 10 ft (3 m) detachable, tangle-resistant flat cable Connectors Gold-plated 1/8” (3.5 mm) L-type mini stereo CABLE A: 1/8” (3.5 mm) male-to-male mini stereo with L-type on one side; CABLE B: 1/8” (3.5 mm) male-to-male mini stereo CABLE A: Gold-plated 1/8” (3.5 mm) male-to-male mini stereo with L-type on one end; CABLE B: 1/8" (3.5 mm) male-to-male mini stereo In the Box Soft carrying case; gold-plated 1/4” adapter; cleaning cloth Semi-rigid carrying case; detachable, tangle-resistant flat cable (4 ft/1.2 m) with in-line remote/mic optimized for Apple devices; 10 ft (3 m) detachable, tangle-resistant flat cable; gold-plated 1/4” adapter; cleaning cloth Semi-rigid carrying case; detachable, tangle-resistant flat cable (4 ft/1.2 m) with in-line remote/mic optimized for Apple devices; detachable, tangle-resistant flat cable (10 ft/3 m); gold-plated 1/4” adapter; cleaning cloth
feature_bullets: Combines the finest materials with legendary Yamaha tuning know-how to deliver a superb listening experience
Ear cushions are extraordinarily soft and smooth, with a feel so natural you will never want to take them off
Offers an in line remote/microphone on the 4 foot cable that is optimized for use with Apple devices
PRO Series cables are flat, tangle resistant and made from a material that is both durable and designed to reduce touch noise transfer effects
Gorgeous geometry and ultra clean design curves are matched with premium color and finish materials, then emblazoned boldly with the Yamaha iconic tuning fork marque
